title: REFACTOR-002: Document fileExists() bug in init.go and update.go
description: Bug: init.go:182 and update.go:169 have incorrect fileExists() that returns true for directories. Should check !info.IsDir(). Will be fixed in REFACTOR-006 and REFACTOR-007.

title: Add integration tests for git remote setup
description: Test git remote flow including security fixes. See ISSUE-005 in spec.

title: REFACTOR-007: Fix bug and migrate cmd/init.go to use fsutil
description: cmd/init.go has a bug in fileExists() at line 182 - it doesn't check \!info.IsDir(), causing false positives on directories. Replace with fsutil.FileExists().

title: ISSUE-018: Reconcile Config Struct Duplication
description: cmd/config.go has comprehensive Config, internal/config/config.go has simple Config. Determine canonical location and reconcile.

title: REFACTOR-006: Fix bug and migrate cmd/update.go to use fsutil
description: cmd/update.go has a bug in fileExists() at line 169 - it doesn't check \!info.IsDir(), causing false positives on directories. Replace with fsutil.FileExists().

title: ISSUE-003: Add non-interactive mode for Git user config
description: Add --git-name and --git-email flags for automation. See ISSUE-003 in spec.

description: Update go directive to 1.23+. See ISSUE-002 in spec.

title: ISSUE-004: Update main.go to Use InitCommand
description: Refactor main.go to dispatch to InitCommand instead of containing init logic. See ISSUE-004 in spec.

title: ISSUE-019: Remove Unnecessary cmd/config.go Re-export
description: Remove the re-export layer in cmd/config.go. Have cmd/init.go import Config directly from internal/config and delete cmd/config.go. This eliminates unnecessary indirection in internal application code.

description: Move Config to internal/config for better organization. See ISSUE-016 in spec.
